Params[3]: Be careful! This is data defense!
If I analyze the defense with my computing power...
You don't know where you are, except that you are... falling.
Someone pulls you up from behind. It is probably Lucia with her jet pack.
Liv and Lee have already landed on the ground five meters below you in what they called a "superhero landing" back in the Golden Age.
Commandant! Be ready for landing! My jet pack... can't last much longer!
Lucia lets go of you one meter above the ground.
Then, you see Lucia landing next to you.
